Paragraph: The device fabricated using PFD2TBT_10Per showed the highest PCE ( 1.51% ) among the PFD2TBT - based polymers.

1. PFD2TBT_10Per: This is likely a specific type or name of a polymer material. It could be considered a "Material Property" or "Compound Property" entity with the property name being "PFD2TBT_10Per".
2. PCE: This stands for Power Conversion Efficiency. It is a measurable property or performance characteristic of a device. Therefore, it is a "Device Property" entity with the property name being "Power Conversion Efficiency" or "PCE".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.
1. PFD2TBT_10Per: This is a specific type or name of a polymer material. It could be considered a "Material Property" entity.
